communications.subject: Freedom of Information Act Request: Research Regarding Kristofor Hans
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

The Secret Service conducted a research study and maintains a database regarding school shootings in America. One school shooting in that database occurred on December 4, 1986, in Lewistown, MT, at Fergus County High School. The person responsible is named Kristofor Hans.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kathleen  Russell

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

I am requesting NA Form 13164 on Matthew Roy Thornton DOB: 07/27/1962 Served in the Coast Guard Cape May, NJ in 1982 for a very short time.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.
In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kimberly Obryon

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Freedom of Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

-Recordings and/or transcripts of interviews pertaining to the murder that occurred at Fergus High School on December 4, 1986. 
-Copies of police reports pertaining to the investigation of the murder that occurred at Fergus High School on December 4, 1986.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 20 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Kathleen  Russell
